item.title: The eco-conscious GROHE smart water system is gaining traction in Asia
item.description:
Source: GROHE. The GROHE Blue system in action. GROHE Blue, a smart water system, has become increasingly popular in Asia since a May 2014 study revealed its smaller carbon footprint compared to bottled mineral water.
